summary: This is an email chain from March 4, 2020, regarding the Office of the Inspector General's Cyber team completing an analysis of a BOP (Bureau of Prisons) device. The analysis found one discussion of Jeffrey Epstein in a text exchange, and the report is attached.

events.title: OIG Cyber Team Analysis of BOP Device
events.description: The Office of the Inspector General's Cyber team completed an analysis of a Bureau of Prisons device and found one discussion of Jeffrey Epstein in a text exchange.

keyFacts: The Office of the Inspector General's Cyber team analyzed a Bureau of Prisons (BOP) device.
The analysis found one discussion of Jeffrey Epstein in a text exchange on the device.
The email correspondence is dated March 4, 2020, and originates from the New York Field Office of the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General.
An attached report containing the analysis is referenced but not included in the provided text.
